s2.name: JORAM source and binary packages
s2.p: The JORAM source and binary packages are available from the ObjectWeb Forge file repository page.

ul.li: joram-raconfig-5.*.tgz, facilities enabling configuration of JCA rars.
joram-5.*-RA.rar, the resource adapter for a collocated JORAM server within any J2EE 1.4 compliant application server.
joram-5.*-remoteRA.rar, the resource adapter for any J2EE 1.4 application server with a non collocated JORAM server (possibly running remotely).

s2.p:
The license agreement is displayed before the download can start.
Click here to start the download process.

Note: all the packages are available as .tgz files. To unzip these files, just go where you want to install JORAM, and unzip it. You can use gunzip and tar tools on unix-like systems, or winzip utility on Windows. Please consult the JORAM documentation for installation instructions and a tutorial.

s2.name: JORAM SVN code base
s2.p: For getting the latest stable JORAM version, or for the current development release, you have to use SVN.

Joram, Xoram (C/C++ client API) and kJoram (J2ME client API) are respectively available by checking out the joram, xoram or kjoram modules. The tests module contains the tests for all the components of Joram.
The latest stable release tag is JORAM_5_1_0. For getting the current development release (potentially unstable), check out joram with no tag.
